headline: Q2 Earnings Highlights: Xylem (NYSE:XYL) Vs The Rest Of The Water Infrastructure Stocks
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Xylem (NYSE:XYL) and the best and worst performers in the water infrastructure industry.
